<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Monstrosity Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=349) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 139 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Wild Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=316)

</column>

---

You can transform into a powerful magical creature. Add the purple worm and sea serpent forms listed in [_monstrosity form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=202) to your [wild shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=316) list. If you have [Soaring Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=333), also add the phoenix form to your _wild shape_ list.

<title level="2">Monstrosity Shape leads to...</title>
[Heart of the Kaiju](/Feats.aspx?ID=2750)
